author: Naxo Oyanguren <natxooy@gmail.com>
listWarning: Zihur ezabatu nahi duzula zerrenda hau? Zeregin guztiak ezabatuko dira.
taskWarning: Zihur ezabatu nahi duzula zeregin hau? Betirako galduko da.
todayText: Gaur zerrendak gaur egin beharko zenituzke zeregin guztiak ditu. Epe muga gainditu duten zereginak zerrenda honetan agertuko dira.
nextText: Hurrengo zereginak Hurrengoak zerrendan ikusiko dituzu. Gaurko zereginak eta beste zerrendatako hiru lehenego zereginak automatikoki erakutsiko dira.
somedayText: Egun batean zerrendak zehatz ez dakizu noiz beteko dituzun zereginak ditu.
deleteWarningsDescription: This disables the confirm box that appears when you delete a task or list.
lowGraphicsDescription: This disables all the fancy animations so that Nitro is even quicker on lesser powered hardware.
themeDescription: Themes allow you to change the look of Nitro. You can even use CSS to create your own!
bgDescription: Change the color of the text so that it looks nice with your custom background.
headingDescription: Change the color of the text so that it looks nice with your custom background.
donateText: Sync is almost finished but we need your help. With your donations we can make sync & mobile apps possible.
syncDescription: Sync allows you to access your tasks from other computers and smartphones.
syncAuto: Every time a change is made
